executiveSummary: Alex Belli and Clay Bakes, co-founders of Haven, pitched their smart door lock system on Shark Tank seeking $500,000 for 6% equity. They demonstrated their floor-mounted lock designed to prevent break-ins and discussed plans to expand into school security. Despite positive feedback on innovation, the sharks declined to invest due to high costs and low margins.

actionItems.task: Scale inventory with suppliers to meet growing demand, particularly from schools
Reduce manufacturing costs to improve profit margins
Continue pursuing school security contracts, beginning with the Arkansas purchase order

nextSteps: The Haven team will continue growing the business independently, focusing on lowering production costs, fulfilling school orders, and expanding distribution while seeking mentorship and potential partnerships outside Shark Tank.
